title: connection problems?
body:
Have anybody else tried receive this error?
my internet works fine, i have watched twitch while the error has occurred and its only my LOL client complaining :s

replies.body:
is it possible to change client? I have nothing but problems with this client -.- 
constant loosing connection and getting kicked out of que! fix it riot!

It looks like you lost connection with pvp.net!  Even though your net is fine using other services, you can still run into hiccups with specific servers.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and resolve any instability that would cause you to essentially lose pulse with the client.  I hope that helps!

i have now tried to uninstall and install 4 times, i have tried every solution they show at "connection issues", and i still get this annoying error, which sometimes quit my game ques, and when i try to que again, it says i have to wait 15 min, cause i left the game -.-
